name: Threadbare Green Plaid Shirt
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence noticably.
It has great armour class for its type (adequate in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
It decreases the users fire resistance unearthly.
